title: Motsi Mabuse
summary: Motshegetsi "Motsi" Mabuse (born 11 April 1981) is a South African dancer. She has appeared on Let's Dance, the German version of Strictly Come Dancing, originally appearing as a professional dancer but later became a judge on the show. On 22 July 2019, it was announced that Mabuse would replace Dame Darcey Bussell as a judge on the 17th series of Strictly Come Dancing.
